text:
I think what you are looking is, it’s actually Engagement API. <https://developers.HubSpot.com/beta-docs/guides/api/crm/engagements/engagement-details>

Here is the API to add calls/meetings to HubSpot <https://developers.HubSpot.com/beta-docs/reference/api/crm/engagements/engagement-details/v1#create-an-engagement>
Hi <@U081VKRD3ED> What is the problem you are having?

Thank you for your kindness!

After reading the URL you provided, I was able to clarify the parts that I didn't understand.

However, my goal has not yet been achieved, so I will continue to investigate.

HI <@U01BJF5QAKA>, thank you for your time, for the blogs returned by this endpoint: `<https://api.hubapi.com/content/api/v2/blog-posts>` is there a way to add the Post Narration audio file for every blog in the response?

Hi <@U081VKRD3ED>
I looked at the API but I don’t see any option to include the narration

Oh okay <@U01BJF5QAKA>, thank you.
Do you know if there is another work around for implementing that audio in an external website?
<@U081VKRD3ED> Is this file publicly available on the blog page?
Hi, everyone! Does anyone know a way to bypass the 429 error? What do you need to do to make automatic API calls while respecting the allowed number of requests within a time interval?"

Hi all :slightly_smiling_face:
Is there a way to support multiple emails via the *v3* api for contacts? I've seen the v1 API threads and related info : <https://developers.HubSpot.com/beta-docs/reference/api/crm/objects/contacts/v1#add-a-secondary-email-address>
But the v3 api also mentions the secondary email can be passed in the body as part of the documentation here : <https://developers.HubSpot.com/beta-docs/guides/api/crm/objects/contacts#secondary-emails>
> •  To add secondary emails to a contact, when creating or editing the contact, in your request body, include emails in the `hs_additional_emails` field. Multiple emails can be separated by a semi-colon.
Tried a request with this parameter but that doesn't add the additional emails.
Hey guys, I'm trying to find a way to get note comments in the API docs, but can't find it. Does anyone know how can I get those ?
Hi, guys! How do I make an API call for a custom object, with the goal of retrieving all deals associated with that object?
<@U07UHNQ302D> You need to make two API calls one for custom object and second to get the deals
<@U082L4DP3QS> As of my last project working with it few months back, you can’t fetch those
<@U077GHXV8QH> Can you share your request body? You need to provide that as `string` each email separated by `;`

<@U07UHNQ302D> Use multiple private apps and rotate using while making requests to increase the limit. Each private have it’s own limit so should have more capacity.

You can also implement *Exponential Backoff* for the retry mechanism when you get 429
